Articles.Content:
Why? THEY GIFTED ME KSP:D

After lots of time crashing... errrr, I mean, launching stuff in demo I can finally play with the full game! I must admit that I'm pretty bad at launching rockets (that's why I generally use Mechjeb for taking off and some orbital operations) so basically there are lots of debris on kerbin, mun and mimbus's orbits. from the 100 (approximately) rockets I launched only 10 landed without any problem and 4 of them landed with a broken engine or a broken leg. Basically, I love this game (I don't know why because I get easily enraged when I lose in a game, and I keep crashing my rockets) and everything inside of it (especially jebedia, that kerbal is awesome, laughing while the rocket flies without any control)
Can I borrow your friends for a while?
